Name: Waifu vs Evil
About the game: Waifu vs Evil is a first-person action horror game set in a small abandoned town that has been attacked by an alien. Explore the deserted houses and streets, find weapons and supplies to fight back the bloodthirsty monsters. Collect all the girls drawings hidden in the city to complete the game. Features Realistic graphics Large open location Melee and ranged weapons Dangerous zombies Ten beautiful drawings of girls
